msContents.summary: This text is a copy of the 2nd column of P. Petaus 53, a list of persons with their financial qualifications and the date . Apparently the second column of a document containing nominations for liturgical offices. A narrow (unpublished) strip of papyrus with the larger piece may be part of the preceding column; the few legible letters seem to be in the same hand.

msItemStruct.note: Pub. status: Recto; Verso is blank
Archive of Petaus, son of Petaus, komogrammateus of Ptolemais Hormou

condition.ab: Broken at all sides; a large piece of piece is missing in the right side, though it has not cost loss of any text. (TC)

origin.origPlace: Syron Kome, Herakleides meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt.
origin.persName: Pathynis, son of Kilikas, mother Thaesis
Pathynis, son of Penneus, grandson of Tales
Sokmas, son of Paaus, grandson of Ilas
Maximus, son of Sokmes, grandson of Tenes
Ischis, son of Horos, mother Thases
Marres, son of Phanesis, mother Taonnophris
Phanesis, son of Horos, mother Charitous
Pnepheros, son of Marres, grandson of Soeris
Orsenouphis, son of Orsenouphis, mother Sambous

provenance.p: Syron Kome, Herakleides meris, Arsinoite nome, province of Egypt.

taxonomy.desc: APIS keywords are controlled locally at the institution level. They are not necessarily consistent.

div.ab: " Syron likewise:;Sextilis, son of Miysis, income, drachmas 800;;Pathynis, son of Kilikas, mother Thaesis, likewise drachmas 700;;Pathynis, son of Penneus, grandson of Tales, likewise drachmas 800;;Sokmas, son of Paaus, grandson of Ilas, likewise drachmas 700;;Maximus, son of Sokmes, grandson of Tenes, likewise drachmas 800;;In Kerkesoucha Orous likewise:;Ischis, son of Horos, mother Thases with an income of drachmas 800; ;Marres, son of Phanesis, mother Taonnophris, likewise drachmas 700;;Phanesis, son of Horos, mother Charitous, likewise drachmas 800;;Pnepheros, son of Marres, grandson of Soeris, likewise drachmas 700;;Orsenouphis, son of Orsenouphis, mother Sambous, likewise drachmas 700.";Year 25 of Marcus Aurelius Commodus Antoninus the Lord."

listBibl.bibl: Hagedorn U - Hagedorn D - Youtie LC - Youtie HC, PPetaus, 54, 1969 -- BL VIII, 277 (bibliography)
